project_descr: The Project is to introduce energy sector bottom-up data collection process for GreenHouse Gas (GHG) inventorying process, systematic prioritization process of energy NAMAs, MRV (Monitor, Report and Verify) for energy sector mitigation actions.

outputs.output_descr: Support to reduce Green House Gas emission of Energy Generation and End-user sectors in Sri Lanka
